argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invrcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | invrcl.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | invrcl.i | |- I = ( invr ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_drngring | |- ( R e. DivRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_unitinvcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. ( Unit ` R ) ) -> ( I ` X ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ex | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( X e. ( Unit ` R ) -> ( I ` X ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( X e. ( Unit ` R ) -> ( I ` X ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 5, 2 | #P_drngunit | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( X e. ( Unit ` R ) <-> ( X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 5, 2 | #P_drngunit | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( ( I ` X ) e. ( Unit ` R ) <-> ( ( I ` X ) e. B /\ ( I ` X ) =/= .0. ) ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_3imtr3d | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( ( X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) -> ( ( I ` X ) e. B /\ ( I ` X ) =/= .0. ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3impib | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) -> ( ( I ` X ) e. B /\ ( I ` X ) =/= .0. ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) -> ( I ` X ) =/= .0. ) |
